edu.usm.sosw.sword.resources

Class UserResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.usm.sosw.sword.resources.UserResource

  • @Path(value="/api/v1/user")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public class UserResource
extends java.lang.Object
    The UserResource class provides a JSON REST API end point for User objects and the youths table. Currently, only path parameters are implemented but QueryParameters should be implemented in the future. The resource class is exposed by registering it within the SwordApplication run function.
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Sean T. Purvis
    See Also:
    MyUser, UserDAO
